titleStmt.title: SII 7.890: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 890. (A.R. No. 262 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmaruviya ticaimukatton paṭaitta perumpuvi viḷaṅka temaruviya patantuḷavit tiruneṭumāl livanenna nirāḻi puṭaittu tayakulat tavatarittu karuṅkaliyiṉ niru ḷotuṅkak katirveṇkuṭai nilā veṟippa varuṅkatirin veyil virikkum maṇimakuṭam pu
ṉaintaruḷi maṇ kaḷippavum maṉaṅ kaḷippavum malarmaṭantaiyarmutal maṅkayar kaṇ kaḷippavun taṇṇaḷippa peruṅkaruṇaiyāl mutalkkāval pūṇṭu cempoṉ virasiṁhāsanattu puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntataruḷiya koIrājakecaripaṟmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīIrājātirājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 5
vatu Irācātirācavaḷaṉāṭṭu milāṭṭu kuṟukalakkakuṟattu tirukkovalūruṭaiyār tiruviraṭṭāṉamūṭaiya nāyanāṟku kiḷiyūr malaiyamān malaiyan periyuṭaiyanāyanṉāna Irācarāca cetiyarāyaṉum Iṟaiyūran periyuṭaiyāṉāṉa Irācarācakkovalarāyaṉum Ivviruvom Inṉāyaṉār koyilil Aiyar Oṟṟiyāḻvār
pulavaraṭiyāna Irācarāca cetiyarāyan ceṉaimikāman Eḻuntaruḷivitta cetināyakaṟkum nācciyāṟkum periyāṉaippiḷḷaiyāṟkum tirunāḷḷeḻuntaruḷum Aḻakiya piḷḷaiyāṟkum cāttupaṭi Amutupaṭikkum taittirunāḷ Eḻuntaruḷavum maṟṟum palapaṇi nimantakkāṟaṟkum tirukkovalūril Akatteripaṟṟil nāṅkaḷ viṭṭa nilattukku melpāṟke
llai cākaraikkum kuḷivikuḻi paḷḷiccantattukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai nattattukku teṟkum kiḻpāṟkellai kiṟṟerittoṭṭukku meṟkkum tenpāṟkellai cantirātittan tūmpininṟum kiḻakkunokki ponta vāykkālukku
m ponnitirumāl periyakkaraikkum vaṭakku Akatteri nāṟpāṟkellaiuḷ Akappaṭa nilattil paḻantevatānam nikki nikkiniṉṟa nilattukku maramañcāṭi pāṭikāvalum veṇṭukoḷum vicatam putiyitu maṉaikāṭcippe
ṟum kūraikkācu kiṭākkācum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa Āyamum koḷḷakkaṭavutallavākavum Inta nilattukku ni kālile koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum maṟṟoṉṟum koḷḷakkaṭavutallavākavum Innāyaṉār Eḻuntaruḷukiṟa
kiḻaittiruvitiāṉa cetiṉāyakapperunteruvum Itukkuk kiḻakkuḷḷa nattamum kukaṉkuḻi Iṉṉāyaṉāṟku ceṅkaḻuṉirt tiruppaḷḷittāmam Ākki cāttiyaruḷukaikku le Itu vallavaraiyan cattiyam Itu paṉmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.890 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
